com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.encoding

Class HttpEncodingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.server.DecoratingService<HttpRequest,HttpResponse,HttpRequest,HttpResponse>
      • com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.encoding.HttpEncodingService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service<HttpRequest,HttpResponse>

    public class HttpEncodingService
extends DecoratingService<HttpRequest,HttpResponse,HttpRequest,HttpResponse>
    A DecoratingService that applies HTTP encoding (e.g., gzip) to an HttpService. HTTP encoding will be applied if the client specifies it, the response content type is a reasonable type to encode, and the response either has no fixed content length or the length is larger than 1KB.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new DecoratingService that HTTP encodes response data published from delegate.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HttpEncodingService

        public HttpEncodingService(Service<? super HttpRequest,? extends HttpResponse> delegate)
        Creates a new DecoratingService that HTTP encodes response data published from delegate. Encoding will be applied when the client supports it, the response content type is a common web text format, and the response either has variable content length or a length greater than 1024.

      • HttpEncodingService

        public HttpEncodingService(Service<? super HttpRequest,? extends HttpResponse> delegate,
                           java.util.function.Predicate<com.google.common.net.MediaType> encodableContentTypePredicate,
                           int minBytesToForceChunkedAndEncoding)
        Creates a new DecoratingService that HTTP encodes response data published from delegate. Encoding will be applied when the client supports it, the response content type passes the supplied encodableContentTypePredicate and the response either has variable content length or a length greater than minBytesToForceChunkedAndEncoding.
